data.prayer: Father, let those from the 42,601 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jalpaiguri, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Jalpaiguri. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Jalpaiguri to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Jalpaiguri access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Mundari people might believe through him.
Please, convict the 42,601 believers in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal, India to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Jalpaiguri do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Jalpaiguri, West Bengal, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

location.name: Jalpaiguri
location.people_groups_list: Brahmin Vaidik, Beg, Karua, Brahmin Varendra, Lodha (Muslim traditions, tribal)
